name: The Sorcerer's Dungeon
description:
The sorcerer orders his apprentice to pack up the dungeon. He will oversee the work as you control the the dungeon pieces as the apprentice.

Move the pieces around, place them so the tunnels form a closed loop and score up. There are monsters appear on the level, if they are in the loop when it's closed, they give extra points.

Be mindful the amount target score: when you reach it, the level will be cleared from unused dungeon pieces.

Also keep an eye on how much time you have to place a dungeon piece: it even will be placed at its current location, or if there's another dungeon piece under it, you will fail.

KEYS TO PLAY

Keyboard:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move tunnel pieces

Press LSHIFT or RSHIFT to rotate left

Press LCTRL or RCTRL to rotate right

Press SPACE or ENTER to drop tunnel piece.

ESC to pause screen (ESC to close, F4 to exit to main menu, from main screen ESC and F4 to exit game)

Gamepad:

Use sticks or Dpad buttons to move tunnel pieces

Press X, left trigger/bumper to rotate left

Press B, right trigger/bumper to rotate right

Press Y to drop tunnel piece.

Start to pause screen (B to close, Select to exit to main menu, from main screen Start and Select to exit game)

Press P or PAUSE to Pause/resume game

Press F7-F8 to decrease/increase sound volume

Press F9-F10 to decrease/increase music volume
